room_title: Escape room "The Study" by The Basement in Las Vegas
review: By far the most immersive room I’ve ever done.  Notice the only bad reviews are people butthurt they didn’t escape?  Most rooms make sure everyone gets out because they are afraid of bad reviews lmao. There needs to be more rooms like this that are actually hard instead of “You get three clues.  Oh, you’re out of clues, here let me give you more...”

room_title: Escape room "The Study" by The Basement in Las Vegas
review: Waste of time.  If the staff would spend more time focusing on their own escape room vs bashing their competitors they would probably be better.

room_title: Escape room "The Study" by The Basement in Las Vegas
review: this one was super challenging didn't make it out but it was an awesome expreience. the set up was pretty cool also. and the employees were bad ass to. doing it again for sure.

room_title: Escape room "The Study" by The Basement in Las Vegas
review: Had a great experience in the Study! Booked our reservation the day of and had a total of 6 people. Great company. The whole experience has the right amount of scare. It was quite difficult we didn't make it out. Will definitely be coming back.

room_title: Escape room "The Study" by The Basement in Las Vegas
review: 201My girlfriend and I have done over 250 escape rooms worldwide... and the Study was my favorite room of all time! It had just the right amount of brains and scare to make it worth every second of the experience. A+ best room ever.

room_title: Escape room "The Study" by The Basement in Las Vegas
review: If you want a great experience this is the place to go. The set up for rooms are amazing. We did the Study and it was awesome. The staff there is great and the nicest people you will meet.

room_title: Escape room "The Study" by The Basement in Las Vegas
review: This room stands out from the other escape rooms I've ever done. It is unique from decorations to puzzles and the staff is great. A little on the creepy side, so be ready!

room_title: Escape room "The Study" by The Basement in Las Vegas
review: We did "The Study", and although it is considered to be chapter 2 in the Basement series, you can pass the rooms in any order you like. Now, the room was greatly decorated and well thought-out. We were a group of six which I think is a perfect number of players. I will be back for the original chapter 1 room!
